metadata.title: Management of Infection in Patients With Kidney Transplant

abstract.original_text: This chapter will: 1. Recognize risk for and manifestations of common opportunistic infections in renal transplant recipients admitted to the intensive care unit. 2. Describe appropriate evaluation and treatment for infections in renal transplant recipients admitted to the intensive care unit.

abstract.original_text: 3. Posttransplant, there are many infections of concern, but CMV, EBV, and BK virus are of particular risk in regard to acute and long-term complications of the patient and of the allograft.
